name: That Awful Spring
description:
A Game Made for the global gamejam 2022 in 48 hours (January 28 - 30th)

Art by: Erik "Staledonuts" Lindahl

Code by: Isak "Kasi" Dalberg

Gamedesign by: Taher "Taher1995" Alzoubi

Music by: Hugo Rauer & Elias Shapiro

SFX Library: Soundsnap.com

A game about a father and his two children living together with a pretty tight relationship.
